search.query: `nexus_index` sourcetype=cisco:nexus:json | lookup nexus_hostname_lookup device AS device OUTPUT hostname AS hostname | eval hostAndHostname = hostname."(".device.")" | stats values(device) as Device by hostAndHostname | fields hostAndHostname Device | sort hostAndHostname

html.p:
This dashboard gives visibility into overall power usage of nexus switches including its input/output power drawn history.
It lets user drill down into specific module and display its usage over time by clicking on a particular module.

search.query: `nexus_index` sourcetype=cisco:nexus:json component=nxpower | lookup nexus_hostname_lookup device AS device OUTPUT hostname AS hostname | lookup nexus_temperature_lookup device AS device,model AS mod_model OUTPUT modtype AS modtype_lookup | stats latest(hostname) AS Hostname latest(actual_input) as "Actual Input(Watts)" latest(actual_out) as "Actual Output(Watts)" latest(ps_status) as Status by device,psnum,psmodel | rename device AS Device psnum as Slot psmodel as Model | search Device = $multiTokenQuery$ | table Hostname,Device,Slot,Model,"Actual Input(Watts)","Actual Output(Watts)",Status | sort Device

|search Device=$multiTokenQuery$ |stats latest(Total Power Capacity) AS "Total Power Capacity" latest(Total Power Allocated(budget)) AS "Total Power Allocated(budget)" latest(Total Power Input(actual draw)) AS "Total Power Input(actual draw)" latest(Total Power Output(actual draw)) AS "Total Power Output(actual draw)" latest(Power Supply redundancy mode (configured)) AS "Power Supply redundancy mode (configured)" latest(Power Supply redundancy mode (operational)) AS "Power Supply redundancy mode (operational)" by Hostname,Device
| search Device=$multiTokenQuery$ | replace "* W" with "*" in "tot_pow_input_actual_draw" | timechart values(tot_pow_input_actual_draw) AS "Total Input Power Actual Draw" by Device
| search Device=$multiTokenQuery$ |replace "* W" with "*" in "tot_pow_out_actual_draw" | timechart values(tot_pow_out_actual_draw) AS "Total Output Power Actual Draw" by Device

html.p: To get detail for Actual Power Drawn over time click on "Module-type"

search.query: `nexus_index` sourcetype=cisco:nexus:json component=nxpower | lookup nexus_hostname_lookup device AS device OUTPUT hostname AS hostname | lookup nexus_temperature_lookup device AS device,model AS mod_model OUTPUT modtype AS modtype_lookup | stats latest(hostname) as Hostname values(modtype_lookup) as modtype_lookup values(mod_model) as mod_model values(actual_draw) as actual_draw values(allocated) as allocated values(modstatus) as modstatus by _time,device,modnum | rename device as Device modnum as "Module Number" | search Device= $multiTokenQuery$ | replace "* W" with "*" in actual_draw | replace "* W" with "*" in allocated | stats latest(Hostname) AS Hostname latest(mod_model) as Model,latest(modtype_lookup) as "Module-Type", latest(allocated) as "Power Allocated(Watts)", latest(actual_draw) as "Power Drawn(Watts)" ,sparkline(avg(actual_draw)) as "Power Drawn History", latest(modstatus) as Status by Device,"Module Number" | table Device,Hostname,"Module Number","Model","Module-Type","Power Allocated(Watts)","Power Drawn(Watts)","Power Drawn History","Status"

`nexus_index` sourcetype=cisco:nexus:json component=nxpower | lookup nexus_hostname_lookup device AS device OUTPUT hostname AS hostname | lookup nexus_temperature_lookup device AS device,model AS mod_model OUTPUT modtype AS modtype_lookup | stats latest(actual_draw) as "Power Drawn(Watts)" latest(allocated) as "Allocated Power" latest(modstatus) as "Module Status" latest(mod_model) as Model latest(modnum) as "Module Number" by _time,modtype_lookup,device | rename device as Device modtype_lookup as "Module_Type" | eval n=split("$Device$","::") | eval deviceval=mvindex(n,0) | eval modval=mvindex(n,1) | where Device=deviceval AND Module_Type=modval | replace "* W" with "*" in "Power Drawn(Watts)" | fields - deviceval,modval,n | timechart latest(Power Drawn(Watts)) AS "Power Drawn" by Module_Type
